content:
Our focus is the data-driven discovery of materials and semiconductors.
This means we use computers to model solids and predict their properties before they have even been made.
We are always interested in hiring talented and driven scientists at any level. If you’re interested, we can be reached by the contact form below.

title: Burton Materials Data Lab

summary: The Eastern Young Scholar award is a 3-year early-career fellowship for scientists working in the east of China.
title: Lee Burton wins Eastern Young Scholar Award 2018

summary: The Seal of Excellence award is issued by the European Commission as an endorsement of scientists for future grant applications.
title: Lee Burton wins EU Seal of Excellence award 2017

content: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.
summary: Analyzing a database of density functional theory results on more than 60â€¯000 compounds, we identify 65 new electride candidates and recover 4 already known.
title: High-Throughput Identification of Electrides from All Known Inorganic Materials

summary: Lee Burton is the principal investigator of the Materials Data lab.
title: Lee A. Burton

summary: Xiaoyan Gao is the group assistant and administrator.
title: Xiaoyan Gao
